reimagined.desc3: . IoTeX is on a mission to enable users to own their devices, as well as the data and value they generate.
empowering.desc: The IoTeX platform is open-source and designed to empower a new generation of ultra-secure and privacy-protecting smart devices to fuel the machine economy.
own.desc: IoTeX combines innovations in blockchain, decentralized identity (DID), and secure hardware to ensure users, not corporations, are in complete control of their digital assets.
